name: moka_vendor_human_exome_selection_metrics
title: v1.1.1 - moka Vendor Human Exome Selection Metrics
summary: Calculates mappings metrics for common vendor human exome kits, with Picard CalculateHsMetrics

inputSpec.name: sorted_bam
inputSpec.label: Sorted mappings
inputSpec.help: A coordinate-sorted BAM file with the human mappings on which metrics will be calculated.

inputSpec.name: vendor_exome_bedfile
inputSpec.label: Bedfile used to calculate HS metrics
inputSpec.help: Choose the vendor exome (enrichment kit) whose coordinates will be used to calculate the selection metrics. See the app help for more information.

inputSpec.name: validation_stringency
inputSpec.label: Validation stringency
inputSpec.help: Picard validates certain aspects of the input BAM file. This parameter controls how Picard behaves with respect to input validation. Choose STRICT to generate a fatal error when validation fails; choose LENIENT to generate a nonfatal warning when validation fails; choose SILENT to suppress validation messages altogether (which can increase performance). This will supply the 'VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=' option to Picard.

inputSpec.name: advanced_options
inputSpec.label: Advanced command line options
inputSpec.help: Advanced command line options that will be supplied directly to the Picard CalculateHsMetrics execution. WARNING: if provided, these advanced options will be used INSTEAD of the common options. Example: BAIT_SET_NAME=EXPERIMENTAL VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=STRICT

outputSpec.name: hsmetrics_tsv
outputSpec.label: Hybrid selection metrics file
outputSpec.help: A text file containing the hybrid selection metrics, as explained on the Picard website. See the app help for more information.

outputSpec.name: pertarget_coverage_tsv
outputSpec.label: Per-target coverage file
outputSpec.help: A text file containing per-target coverage information. See the app help for more information.
